SEARCH
Package edu.bu.labs.routing

Record Class Path<T>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
edu.bu.labs.routing.Path<T>
Record Components:
parent - The 'singly-linked-list' pointing to the previous point in the path.
current - The point the agent was in at this part of the path.
trueCost - The actual cost, g(x), the agent actually travelled to get to this point.
heuristicCost - The expected cost to get to the end state.
public record Path<T>(Path<T> parent, T current, double trueCost, double heuristicCost, int numVertices) extends Record
Stores a path of points between 2 points.

Conceptually, this is a reverse singly linked list, where the tail element is the "destination" and you can grab the parent recursively to get the head element, or the "origin."
